name: curff
description: Boilerplate code for fast-forward read-only cursor
body:
DECLARE /* variables */

DECLARE $CURSOR$ CURSOR FAST_FORWARD READ_ONLY FOR
/* SELECT statement */

OPEN /* cursor name */

FETCH NEXT FROM /* cursor name */ INTO /* variables */

WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
BEGIN

/* cursor logic */

FETCH NEXT FROM /* cursor name */ INTO /* variables */

END

CLOSE /* cursor name */
DEALLOCATE /* cursor name */
